OOC: I'm going to have all new characters, but thank you, David Torrey...
 =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: David Torrey 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Friday, August 18, 2000 2:47 AM
  Subject: NBMRPG/NBWRPG


  (W=
ow! All the people! Well, now I'm definitely gonna have to make one. It wil=
l take place on Cybertron's present, and I have no problems with transferri=
ng characters from NBW to NBM or back, so feel free to bring your character=
s, but don't abandon this great RPG!! BTW Magmatron is going to kinda take =
Megatron's place on Cybertron, he will get control of a large area of the p=
lanet, but not all. And the forces will be Maximal, Predacon, Destron, and =
Other)
   
  ::Magmatron::
   
      Upon returning to his base he decided =
to set up some charges in the mountain to move the ship. He sent robotics t=
eams to plant these bombs.
      "All Destron forces, return to base emidet=
ally," He commanded. "Minor explosives will be detonating shortly, I need t=
o be closer to a ocean."
   
  (This will also give a definite place for Ma=
gmatron's lair. I've also gotta make a Drake Magmatron figure, gotta get BM=
 Megs for that)

----------------------------------------------------------=
